column2: All these stories the Federation is feeding us are far too good to be true. There’s no way they aren’t lying to us.
Did you just say you want to take a boat to the Low Seas? ...Are you sure about that?
Why aren’t the Architects doing anything to help us? Oh, I knew that the Federation couldn’t be trusted!
Now that the Federation is gone, everyone’s back to their old selves again! This is the Saronia I know and love.
